name: password_generation
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool explorarc_s_password_generation_api.
Tool description: The Best API to Generate Random Password with your desired length and as a response you get an set of 10 Passwords
API description: The Best API to Generate Random Password with your desired length and as a response you get an set of 10 Passwords

length.description: The desired length of the passwords. Defaults to 10.
